cbinstall.name: Dada Mail Subscriptions
cbinstall.author: Bruce Scherzinger
cbinstall.description:
Dada Mail Subscriptions Community Builder Plug-In v3.8

© 2010-2019 Bruce Scherzinger

Allows users to subscribe/unsubscribe to Dada Mail mailing lists from their CB profiles.

Special tags you can insert into email notice message fragments are as follows:

TagWhat is InsertedIn Message Parts
[USER]Name of the subscriber.A,E,F
[SITE]Name of the website.A,E,F
[EMAIL]Primary account email address of the subscriber.A,E,F
[EMAIL]Email address applicable to the subscription or email address change.B,C,D
[OLD]Old email address applicable to email address change.D
[LIST]Name of the email list being un/subscribed.B,C,D

A Subscribe or Unsubscribe message will be inserted for each modification the user makes. When HTML format is used, you can make this appear as a bulleted list. When Text format is used, there is no formatting capability at all (not even using newlines).

Dada Mail is Free Software and is released under the Gnu Public License. http://dadamailproject.com

param.name: @spacer
param.label: EMAIL OPTIONS
param.description: Extra email addresses and other options.

param.name: dada_autosubscribe
param.label: Auto-subscribe Lists
param.description: Enter short names of lists to which new user primary account email addresses should be automatically subscribed separated with commas. For all lists, enter * or for none leave blank.

param.name: dada_emails
param.label: Use Multiple Email Addresses
param.description: Select a number to allow one or multiple email addresses (up to 4) per user for subscribing to Dada Mail lists. You will need to provide one field name for each subscription you want to support. Selecting No indicates only the primary account email can be subscribed to Dada Mail lists.

param.name: dada_email1
param.label: Email #1
param.description: Enter the field name for an email address each user can use to subscribe to Dada Mail lists.

param.name: dada_email2
param.label: Email #2
param.description: Enter the field name for an email address each user can use to subscribe to Dada Mail lists.

param.name: dada_email3
param.label: Email #3
param.description: Enter the field name for an email address each user can use to subscribe to Dada Mail lists.

param.name: dada_email4
param.label: Email #4
param.description: Enter the field name for an email address each user can use to subscribe to Dada Mail lists.

param.name: dada_email_opts
param.label: Email Options Field:
param.description: Enter the field name of the field where the full list of options is defined. This is necessary if you use a CB Code Field and your email list name options are not statically defined. If you are not using the CB Code Field plugin, leave this blank.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: EMAIL NOTIFICATION
param.description: The remaining options allow you to customize how this plug-in sends notification emails.

param.name: send_email_notice
param.label: Send Notification to
param.description: Do you want an email message sent when a user subscribes or unsubscribes?

param.name: send_termination_notice
param.label: Send Account Deletion Notification
param.description: Do you want an email message sent when a user account is deleted?

param.name: admin_addr
param.label: Admin Address
param.description: Enter the address to receive Admin notices. Leave blank to use site administrator address. NOTE: This feature uses PHPMailer. On some servers, this address may have to be different than the Site Administrator address or no message will be sent to the Admin.

param.name: email_format
param.label: Email Format
param.description: Which format should be used for sending the messages?

param.name: email_prefix
param.label: Part A) Message Prefix
param.description: Front part of the message text to send. HTML is allowed.

param.name: subscribe_email_msg
param.label: Part B) Subscribe Message
param.description: Message text to send to the subscribing member. HTML is allowed.

param.name: autosubscribe_email_msg
param.label: Part B) Auto-Subscribe Message
param.description: Message text to send to the auto-subscribed member. HTML is allowed.

param.name: unsubscribe_email_msg
param.label: Part C) Unsubscribe Message
param.description: Message text to send to the unsubscribing member. HTML is allowed.

param.name: changed_email_msg
param.label: Part D) Address Change Message
param.description: Message text to send when a member changes an email address. HTML is allowed.

param.name: email_suffix
param.label: Part E) Message Suffix
param.description: End part of the message text to send. HTML is allowed.

param.name: email_subject
param.label: Part F) Email Subject
param.description: Subject of your subscription notification emails.

param.name: email_from_addr
param.label: From Address
param.description: From address for email notices. Leave blank to use site administrator address.

param.name: email_from_name
param.label: From Name
param.description: From name for email notices. Leave blank to use site administrator name.
